name: HP - Envy 2-in-1 14" Full HD Touch-Screen Laptop - Intel Core 5 - 8GB Memory - 512GB SSD - Natural Silver
Product Name: Envy 2-in-1 14" Full HD Touch-Screen Laptop - Intel Core 5 - 8GB Memory - 512GB SSD
features:
['Get a fresh perspective with Windows 11
From a rejuvenated Start menu, to new ways to connect to your favorite people, news, games, and content—Windows 11 is the place to think, express, and create in a natural way.', 'Intel Core 5 120U processor
Delivering performance for real-world multitasking, stunning graphics, and more reliable connectivity, Intel Core processors power real-world computing you can count on. Have confidence that your PC will keep up with you, no matter what you’re doing or where you’re going.', 'Edge-to-edge FHD touchscreen
Your entertainment just got pushed to the very edge. Get expansive, Full High Definition, vibrant images with awesome colors, and intuitively control your PC right from the screen.', 'Intel graphics
Enjoy vivid and immersive visuals in creative applications and gaming.', 'PCIe NVMe SSD storage
Get up to 15x faster performance than a traditional hard drive.¹', 'Effortlessly connected
Enjoy faster speeds, improved performance, greater capacity and lower latencies than earlier iterations with Wi-Fi 6E and Bluetooth 5.3 wireless card.', 'HP Fast Charge
Go from 0 to 50% charge in approximately 30 minutes.²', 'Windows CoPilot with CoPilot key
Kickstart your creativity and productivity with Copilot in Windows. Now with key that lets you access this AI-powered intelligent assistant tool with a single press of a button.', 'Unblock your connected world.
Intel Unison effortlessly connects your PC and choice of phone for a universal, easy to use experience. Now with UniFeed, Universal Control, and Device Support, Unison connects you further.', '5MP IR camera
The high-quality-camera lets you video chat in stunning detail, at up to 2592x1944 resolution ensuring the truest picture to real life as possible.', "Poly Studio Audio with dual speakers
HP + Poly together will continuously accelerate innovation across our hybrid solutions, including AI-generated technology. With pitch perfect audio, you'll get the best experience to collaborate anywhere with audio tuned by Poly Studio.", 'HP Audio Boost
Smart amplification technology gives you loud, clear, and dynamic sound.', 'HP True Vision 5MP camera
The high-quality camera lets you video chat with the entire family in stunning detail, at up to 2592 x 1944 resolution.', 'Fingerprint reader
Seamlessly log in to your device in any position with the touch of your finger. Patented 3D fingerprint technology ensures secure access.', 'Backlit keyboard
Keep going comfortably even in darker environments.', 'Camera Shutter
Ensure your privacy with a visible shutter that turns off your PC’s camera.', 'Work. Write. Play. Naturally.
The 360-degree hinge gets you in the perfect position to work, write, watch, and play.', 'Optimized metal design
Streamlined, metal design delivers a thinner, lighter PC with greater durability.', '87.36% screen to body ratio
Revolutionize your display and see more of what you love with this slim bezel design. Enjoy an immersive multimedia experience with a maximized viewing area.', 'Enjoy 1-month of high-quality games.
Use the Xbox App to play hundreds of high-quality PC games with friends including new day one titles and get an EA Play membership. Xbox Game Pass Ultimate also enables you to play console games on your Windows PC with cloud gaming, and chat with friends across PC, mobile, and Xbox console.', '¹Based on HP internal testing using CrystalDiskMark benchmarking software. Performance is sequentially faster (read only) compared to traditional 5,400 rpm HDD.', '²Recharges your battery up to 50% within 30 minutes when the system is off (using “shut down” command). After charging has reached 50% capacity, charging speed will return to normal speed. Charging time may vary +/-10% due to System tolerance.']

name: ASUS - ROG Zephyrus G16 16" OLED QHD 240Hz Gaming Laptop - Intel Core Ultra 9 - 16GB LPDDR5X - NVIDIA RTX 4070 - 1TB SSD - Eclipse Gray
Product Name: ROG Zephyrus G16 16" OLED QHD 240Hz Gaming Laptop - Intel Core Ultra 9 - 16GB LPDDR5X - NVIDIA RTX 4070 - 1TB SSD
features:
['', 'Windows Copilot AI assistant
Meet Copilot in Windows – your AI-powered assistant for quick answers, creative inspiration, and focused tasks. Boost productivity with fast answers, image generation, and more. Elevate your Windows 11 experience and unleash creativity!', 'OLED ROG Nebula Display and NVIDIA G-SYNC
Elevate your visual experience with the Zephyrus G16, featuring an OLED ROG Nebula Display. Enjoy rapid 0.2ms response times, vivid 2K resolution, and a smooth 240Hz refresh rate. With NVIDIA G-SYNC, eliminate visual tearing, minimize stuttering, and reduce input lag.', 'AI-powered Intel Core Ultra 9 185H processor
Accelerate your workflow with the Intel Core Ultra 9 185H processor. This chip features built-in AI accelerators that are ready to take advantage of the latest in technology. Dedicated Neural Processing Unit (NPU) cores allow AI to reduce power consumption for longer battery life during sustained AI workloads.', 'Top-of-the-line graphics with NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4070
Maximize gaming and creativity with an NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4070 laptop GPU, with a max TGP of 115W. Game-changing features like DLSS 3.0 and ray tracing technology bring game graphics to life by simulating sunlight and creating a realistic environment for an immersive gaming experience.', "Seamless multitasking with 16GB of LPDDR5X RAM
Equipped with 16GB of LPDDR5X RAM, the Zephyrus G16 effortlessly handles multitasking demands whether you're gaming, creating, or simply browsing for the latest trends.", 'Rapid loading times with 1TB of PCIe 4.0 SSD Storage
Save files rapidly and store more data and games. With massive amounts of storage and advanced communication power, PCIe SSDs are great for major gaming applications, multiple servers, daily backups, and more.', 'Premium Aluminum CNC Chassis
The Zephyrus G16 sports a premium aluminum chassis meticulously crafted through CNC machining. Along with the customizable Slash lighting array, this laptop is the perfect blend of durability, elegance, and individuality.', '4.08lbs light and 0.59" slim
Embrace portability without compromise. The ROG Zephyrus G16’s ultra slim 0.59” profile and lightweight 4.08lbs 16-inch chassis redefine gaming on the go.', 'Xbox Game Pass Ultimate included
Play Minecraft Legends and hundreds of other PC games on the ROG Zephyrus G16 with 3 months of Game Pass. *Terms apply.', 'Stay cool with ROG Intelligent Cooling
Sustain peak performance with ROG Intelligent Cooling featuring liquid metal that reduces CPU temperatures by up to 13 degrees, 2nd Gen Arc Flow Fans, and Tri-Fan Technology.', 'NVIDIA Advanced Optimus with MUX Switch
A MUX Switch increases gaming performance by 5-10% by routing frames directly from the dGPU to the display bypassing the iGPU. With Advanced Optimus the switch between iGPU and dGPU becomes automatic based on the task, optimizing battery life.', 'Audio excellence with 6 speakers and Dolby Atmos
Pump up the volume with newly improved woofers on the Zephyrus G16 offering 47% volume increase and 100Hz bass frequency. Dolby Atmos support, AI noise cancellation and a 3D mic array further enhance your audio experience.', 'Advanced Connectivity
Stay connected with dual USB-C ports, HDMI 2.1, USB 3.2 Gen2 Type-A ports, and a dedicated UHS-II MicroSD card reader.']
Advanced Graphics Rendering Technique(s): DLSS 3 (Deep Learning Super Sampling), Ray tracing

features:
['Copilot+ PCs. A new AI era begins
Turn your ideas from text prompts into generated artwork. With Recall*, search across time to find the content you need. Understand new languages instantly with Live Captions. Copilot+ PCs powered by the Snapdragon X Elite processor come with 45 Trillion Operations Per Second of NPU power, and they’re all set to transform the way you create, find and communicate.', 'Get a fresh perspective with Windows 11
From a rejuvenated Start menu, to new ways to connect to your favorite people, news, games, and content—Windows 11 is the place to think, express, and create in a natural way.', '13.8" PixelSense Flow display with 2304 x 1536 resolution
Brilliant and more responsive touchscreen display with the thinnest bezels of any Surface. Enjoy smoother motions and swift interactions with up to 120HZ refresh rate.', 'Snapdragon X Plus (10 core) processors
Unleash the power of a Copilot+ PC with the new Snapdragon X Plus (10 core) Processor. Experience unparalleled productivity in ultra-portable laptop designs, with battery life that lasts for days.', 'Qualcomm Adreno GPU
The integrated Qualcomm Adreno GPU delivers graphics-intensive presentations and entertainment.', 'Find your perfect match
Crafted with lightweight yet durable aluminum in four stunning colors¹ - Platinum, Black, and new Sapphire, and Dune.', 'AI-enhanced Studio Camera
The new HD 1080 Surface Studio Camera paris seamlessly with AI-powered Studio effects like automatic framing keeps you, or the whole family in focus, even as you move around your space.', 'Type with perfection
Experience impeccable typing—every keystroke perfected. With optimal key travel for accurate and swift typing. Let your thoughts flow with the satisfying sound and feel of typing.', 'Most inclusive touchpad
Built-in features to support users with disabilities including the adaptive touch mode in the Surface Precision Haptic touchpad.', 'All day battery life
With up to 20 hours of battery life², Surface Laptop can keep up with whatever you need to do, wherever you need to do it, all day long.', 'The ports you need
Charge on-the-go, transfer data fast, or create the ultimate desktop set up with two USB-C 4 ports and support for up to three 4K monitors at 60Hz₄.', 'Designed with sustainability in mind
Made with more recycled materials than Surface Laptop 5, including a minimum of 67.2% recycled content in the enclosure³.']

name: Lenovo - Yoga 7i 2-in-1 14" 2K Touchscreen Laptop - Intel Core Ultra 7 155U with 16GB Memory - 1TB SSD - Storm Grey
Product Name: Yoga 7i 2-in-1 14" 2K Touchscreen Laptop - Intel Core Ultra 7 155U with 16GB Memory - 1TB SSD
features:
['Windows 11 Home operating system
Windows 11 brings back the Start Menu from Windows 7 and introduces new features, like the Edge Web browser that lets you markup Web pages on your screen.', '14" IPS LCD touch screen for hands-on control
Natural finger-touch navigation makes the most of Windows 11. The 1920 x 1200 resolution boasts impressive color and clarity. IPS technology for wide viewing angles. Energy-efficient LED backlight.', "Intel Core Ultra 7 155U processor
Smart 12 core, fourteen-way processing performance. Intel Turbo Boost Technology delivers dynamic extra power when you need it, while increasing energy efficiency when you don't.", 'Intel HD Graphics
On-processor graphics with shared video memory provide everyday image quality for Internet use, basic photo editing and casual gaming.', '16GB system memory for intense multitasking and gaming
Reams of high-bandwidth LPDDR5X RAM to smoothly run your graphics-heavy PC games and video-editing applications, as well as numerous programs and browser tabs all at once.', '1TB solid state drive (SSD) for a blend of storage space and speed
While offering less storage space than a hard drive, a flash-based SSD has no moving parts, resulting in faster start-up times and data access, no noise, and reduced heat production and power draw on the battery.', '360° flip-and-fold design
Offers four versatile modes — laptop, tablet, tent and stand. Lenovo Transition automatically switches specific applications to full screen when changing from PC to tablet, tent or stand position.', '4 built-in stereo speakers
Optimized Dolby audio enhancements, including Surround Virtualizer technology.', 'Weighs 3.57 lbs. and measures 0.72" thin
Lightweight design, featuring a slightly smaller screen and omitting the DVD/CD drive for improved portability. 4-cell lithium-ion battery.', 'HDMI 1.4 output expands your viewing options
Connect to an HDTV or high-def monitor to set up two screens side by side or just see more of the big picture.', 'Built-in media reader for simple photo transfer
Supports MicroSD memory card formats.', 'Wireless network connectivity
High-speed wireless LAN built into the screen, so it connects to your network or hotspots on the most common Wi-Fi standards in both laptop and tablet modes.', 'Built-in HD webcam with microphone
Makes it easy to video chat with family and friends or teleconference with colleagues over Skype or other popular applications.', 'Backlit keyboard for easy typing in dim or dark locations
Touchpad with scroll and multitouch capability.', 'Basic software package included
30 day trial of Microsoft Office 365 & McAfee LiveSafe.', 'Additional port
Headphone/microphone combo jack.', 'Built-in fingerprint reader
Streamlines security settings for quick, typo-free access.', '2 Months Adobe Creative Cloud: Unlimit your creativity
Start creating with a 2-month Adobe Creative Cloud membership**. Already a member? No problem. Your existing payment method will be paused for two months.', 'Note: This laptop does not include a built-in DVD/CD drive.']

features:

Get up to 15x faster performance than a traditional hard drive.¹', 'AMD Radeon graphics
Whether it’s games or movies, experience high performance for all your entertainment.', 'HP True Vision FHD IR camera
